short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be able to disable / hide / block all or only certain Twitch extensions on Twitch channels

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to either disable / hide / block all Twitch channel extensions or just selected ones. There is also an option to only allow selected extensions to display.
